metadata.Title: CVE-2022-24439 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Compliant (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description: All versions of package gitpython are vulnerable to Remote Code Execution (RCE) due to improper user input validation, which makes it possible to inject a maliciously crafted remote URL into the clone command. Exploiting this vulnerability is possible because the library makes external calls to git without sufficient sanitization of input arguments.

criterions.comment: python-git package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
